    About me

    Welcome to my personal website! I'm David Carrascal.

    Currently a student of the degree of Telematics Engineering and research fellow in the research group GIST-netserv, University of Alcalá (Madrid, Spain).

    You can get more information through my social media profiles. I usually go posting the projects that I'm developing : LinkedIn, Research gate, Twitter.

    I really like programming, right now I'm participating in the challenge of #100DaysOfCode. Everything I have created is uploaded on my Github profile.
